summary: "Abbey Road" is a famous album by the Beatles, released in 1969. It's their final recorded album, even though "Let It Be" came out later. The music combines rock, pop, blues, and more. The band had some disagreements while making it, but the result was still popular. At first, critics had mixed feelings, but now it's seen as one of the Beatles' best works and one of the greatest albums ever. The cover, showing the Beatles crossing a street, is very well-known.
title: Abbey Road
